question: What is the theme of the 2018 World Health Day (WHD)?
option2: Good health adds life to years
explanation: The World Health Day (WHD) is observed every year on 7 April to mark the anniversary of the founding of World Health Organization (WHO) and to spread awareness about health and well being. As this year (2018) is WHO\'s 70th Anniversary year too, the organization has appealed the world leaders to live up to the pledges they made and agreed to in the Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) in 2015 and for taking concrete actions to progress towards Health For All. The 2018 theme \"Universal health coverage: everyone, everywhere\" is an indication that nations around the world are aspiring to provide higher accessibility of healthcare to their citizens.
